General.Name: Skue Sparebank
General.Description: Skue Sparebank provides various banking products and services for individual and business in Norway. The company offers operating, tax deduction, capital, client, deposit, and group accounts; business, construction, personal, vehicle, and small loans, as well as mortgage, bank guarantee, overdraft, and leasing services; and home and leisure, car and other vehicles, pet, company and employees, agriculture insurance products. It also provides savings and pension products; and online and mobile banking, bank card, and payment services. The company was formerly known as Nes Prestegjelds Sparebank and changed its name to Skue Sparebank in October 2013. Skue Sparebank was founded in 1842 and is based in Geilo, Norway.
